Key: Man, today was something...

My whole afternoon's gone because of that weird
phenomenon... I was planning on going shopping,
but now it's dark out.

(I had Arusu go straight home. It seems like it's
fine that she's not with me 24/7.)

I need to hurry home, or Tohka will be hungry.
That won't end well.

(Normally Tohka and the girls live next to me, but
today we're going to have dinner together.)

Well... our situation is so confusing. We should
stick together as much as possible.

Huh...? That's... Arusu, right?
She should be home...
Hey Arusu—
Huh... Where did she go? What's going on...?
That was... Arusu, right? I could be wrong.
...I'm curious. I'm going to run after her.
*Pant, pant*... *pant*...
Damn it. I should have left my groceries behind.
But... This is Takadai Park.

Hehe... Just as I thought. You ran after me, Shido
Itsuka.
(Huh? It's Arusu, right? She seems different...)

You could have left that bag behind, you know?
No one in this world would steal it.

But... I guess that's what makes you a good guy.
Why did you run after me? Are you interested in
me?

Are you... Arusu? The way you speak is like a
completely different person.

Haha, a completely different person, huh?
Surprised? Which one do you like more?
Are you really Arusu?
Hehe... That's right.

It's true... your face and voice are the same,
but...

I am Arusu. There is no doubt about it...
I am Arusu.
I see... I suppose so.

Hm... Let's see. I am Arusu. But I guess I could
also say that I'm not Arusu.

You are her, but you're not? So... you have
a split personality?

(I wonder if it's like Yoshino and Yoshinon...
If that's the case, it kind of makes sense.)
Beats me! Hehe...

Shido Itsuka. Here, in this world, what are you
going to do...? How will things unfold?

I am looking forward to that. So I want you to do
more, and make your choice.

And show me. I want to see what love means to all
of you.
So you are the same. You and the Arusu I know.

Then, let's end it here for now...
See you, Shido Itsuka.
Whoa, it's bright...!
What was that light? Hey, Arusu?
She's gone... What was that?
That was Arusu, right? I'm sure of it...
Oh, well... I guess I can go home.

So many things happened that didn't make any
sense. I'm so tired...
I'm home.
Huh? Arusu? You're here.
Yes. Did you have business with me?
Uh... Weren't you just at Takadai Park?

No. I came straight back to the Itsuka residence
after school.
And you didn't go anywhere afterwards?

Correct. I do not understand the intent behind
your question, Shido Itsuka.
Well... Uh...

(The girl I spoke to earlier was Arusu, or so I
thought. Whether she doesn't remember or she's
lying, I doubt I can get any more information...)

Shido! You're late. Where did you go?
I'm starving!

Oh, sorry about that. I'll prepare dinner now, so
hold on.
Okay!
Shido Itsuka?

...No, what I saw earlier was nothing. I think I
misunderstood, so don't worry.
Okay.

It could be one of those walkthrough hints... And
it could be a navigation NPC...

(The usual light Arusu and the dark Arusu I
encountered earlier seem to have different
personalities depending on their role.)
Hmm...

(No matter how much I think about it, there are
too many unknown factors.)
Well... I guess I'll save that for later.
